item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! Thanks for visiting my website! This is still VERY much a work in progress. It is also where I get to write and post about things that I make and work on. So if you’re interested in learning about me, this is the place for that. I’m originally from Seattle, Washington but I’ve been living in Montreal for the last 7 years (since September 2012). Before I came here, I spent a gap year living in Israel.

item.title: Experience
item.description:
Education McGill University Montreal, Quebec (Sept 2012 – May 2017) Major: Materials Engineering (Co-op) Engineering Experience Haply Robotics Montreal, Quebec (January 2018 – Current) Business Development Coordinator MacDonald Dettwiler & Associates Longueille, Montreal (May 2017 - December 2018) Component Engineer McGill Composites and Structures Laboratory McGill University (January 2015 – August 2015) Co-op Student
Teaching Music (Kijiji Ad) - Beginner and intermediate levels of music theory, primarily focused around bass guitar

item.title: Things
item.description: As mentioned in the caption of this website I make music and things! Most of the details of how I’m building what I’m working on can be found on my GitHub page, but here are some of the projects I work on that are cool to see. Plug for the tool I use for some of these, the Haplet Graphics I like using Java to make cool visualizations!
